TextView.android:text:
Q: Will my friends have to sign up to be added and notified about group events?
A: All users will have to sign up to use any functionality in the app to tailor the experience to each individual user.
Q: Will I be able to add my own activities for the app to be used?
A: Yes! Navigate to the cart to add dummy activities for any activity not found in the system.
Q: What difference does this have to a random option picker online?
A: Our app provides functionalities top of a random option picker, like a calendar and friends list, to ensure that the whole experience is as intuitive as possible.
Q: How can I add my friends to an event?
A: You will need the email your friend used to invite them to any events.
